text:
```We need some guidance on good practices with the following case:

We want to obtain all the HubSpot businesses (perhaps with certain filters), but we are interested in obtaining them at the history level, that is, they can already be obtained through their api one by one and indicating that they give us their history, but since there are many businesses There are times to reach the limit of calls per second, which I would like to know if you recommend any other way, the objective is to persist this information elsewhere for analysis.```
